site_name: Development Site At 105-106 New Bond Street And 18
description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 4th June 2025 (RN: 25/01184/FULL), which itself varied Conditions 1 and 6 of planning permission dated 11th September 2020 (RN:19/06794/FULL) for, 'Demolition behind the retained New Bond Street facade and erection of a new building comprising sub-basement, basement, ground and six upper storeys for use as retail (Class A1) at basement, part ground and mezzanine floors; offices (Class 81) at part ground, third to sixth floors; and dual/alternative use of the first and second floor as either offices (Class 81) and/or retail (Class A1). Office access to be via Haunch of Venison Yard. Installation of plant at sub-basement and sixth floor levels, terraces at third to fifth floor levels and cycle storage and waste stores at subÂ­ basement level' NAMELY, to reconfigure the roof height and design and plant area in line with the MEP strategy requirements for plant space and to consolidate and improve Level 04 and the terrace in response to increased plant space required and development on neighbouring sites. (Application under Section 73 of the Act)
